wikipedia_page.main:
Sir John Hugo Rutherford, 2nd Baronet (31 October 1887 – 28 December 1942) was a Conservative party politician in the United Kingdom. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Liverpool Edge Hill from 1931 to 1935. He was made a baronet on 24 July 1923.
Rutherford was the father of Prudence Hero Napier, the primatologist.
